biotools.summary: The tool comprises a set of utilities to convert all-atoms coordinates to arbitrary residue-based CG schemes, write GROMACS’ topological information at any resolution into PSF format and a VMD plugin to visualize, analyze and retrieve pseudo-atomistic information from CG trajectories performed with the force field.

bioschemas.name: SIRAH
bioschemas.summary: The tool comprises a set of utilities to convert all-atoms coordinates to arbitrary residue-based CG schemes, write GROMACS’ topological information at any resolution into PSF format and a VMD plugin to visualize, analyze and retrieve pseudo-atomistic information from CG trajectories performed with the force field.
